mapper.select: select c.cate_name cateName, v.id id,v.title vTitle, v.brief vBrief,v.path vPath,v.cover vCover,v.publish_date vPublishDate, u.head_img headImg from yx_category c right join yx_video v on c.id=v.category_id left join yx_user u on v.user_id=u.id order by v.publish_date desc
